name: SupportEyeBoyAndBaelBaby
_source: speak;EyeBoy;Hmm?|What is this young Bael doing in my study area?|These ancient tomes are far too advanced for your kind.
speak;EyeBoy;You're...examining the magical symbols?|Curious.|Most creatures flee from arcane knowledge.
speak;EyeBoy;Wait. You can sense the magical auras, can't you?|That's...actually quite remarkable for a Bael.
speak;EyeBoy;*sigh*|I suppose you want to watch me practice my spellwork?|Very well, but do not interfere.
speak;EyeBoy;Observe the precise hand movements...well, tentacle movements in my case.
speak;EyeBoy;You're...actually paying attention.|Most beings find my lectures tedious.
speak;EyeBoy;Perhaps you have more potential than I initially assessed.|I am {v:EyeBoyName}, scholar of the elder arts.
speak;EyeBoy;{v:BaelBabyName}, is it?|Very well.|You may observe my studies...from a respectful distance.
speak;EyeBoy;A Bael with magical sensitivity...how peculiar.|This could prove...educational.
speak;EyeBoy;{v:BaelBabyName}!|There you are.|I've been searching for you everywhere.
speak;EyeBoy;I require your assistance with something...|*Ahem*, Though I hardly need help, of course.
speak;EyeBoy;There's an ancient spell I've been attempting to decipher.|The magical resonance keeps...eluding me.
speak;EyeBoy;Your natural magical sensitivity might...might be useful.|Not that I require assistance from a youngling.
speak;EyeBoy;Focus your senses here...|Can you detect the magical flow?
speak;EyeBoy;Yes!|Yes, exactly there!|The disruption in the weave!|You found it immediately!
speak;EyeBoy;Remarkable!|The spell is complete!|Your intuitive grasp of magical currents is...is actually quite impressive.
speak;EyeBoy;I...|I may have underestimated your capabilities.|For a Bael, your magical perception is extraordinary.
speak;EyeBoy;Perhaps...perhaps we could study together?|Your natural talent combined with my vast knowledge could prove...beneficial.
speak;EyeBoy;Excellent!|Though naturally, I shall be the teacher.|You show promise, young {v:BaelBabyName}.
speak;EyeBoy;{v:BaelBabyName}, quickly!|The ancient ward is failing!|If we don't stabilize it, the entire ruin will collapse!
speak;EyeBoy;I need you to channel your energy into the focal point!|Trust me!
speak;EyeBoy;More power!|I can't maintain this alone!|The magical matrix is too complex!
speak;EyeBoy;That's it! Your power is flowing perfectly!|We're synchronizing!
speak;EyeBoy;We did it!|The ward is stable!|{v:BaelBabyName}, that was...that was magnificent!
speak;EyeBoy;In all my centuries of study...|I have never experienced such perfect magical harmony.
speak;EyeBoy;You're not just magically sensitive, {v:BaelBabyName}.|You're a natural mage!|Perhaps...perhaps even more gifted than I am.
speak;EyeBoy;I've spent lifetimes accumulating knowledge...|But you...you understand magic instinctively.
speak;EyeBoy;I'm proud to call you my partner, {v:BaelBabyName}.|Together, we could unlock mysteries that have puzzled scholars for millennia.
speak;EyeBoy;Ha ha!|Though I suppose I should stop calling myself your teacher.|We're equals now. True magical partners.
speak;EyeBoy;Come, my dear friend.|There are countless spells yet to discover!|And I can think of no better companion for the journey.
